resources.string: No servers found. Try again later.
Your download connection is suitable for basic web browsing only. Streaming video content will be very slow.
Your download connection is suitable for basic web browsing only. Streaming video content will be slow.
Your download connection may struggle to keep up with video streaming of a higher quality than SD (480p).
Your download connection may struggle to keep up with video streaming of a higher quality than HD (1080p).
Your download connection will be able to handle one device streaming video in 4K.
Your download connection will be able to handle multiple devices streaming video in 4K.
Your download connection is very fast and will be abe to handle multiple devices streaming 8K video.
Your download connection is very fast. Your connection will likely not cause any issues streaming any content.
Your upload connection is not suitable for even basic video calls.
Your upload connection is suitable for basic video calls.
Your upload connection is suitable for full HD video calls.
Your upload connection is suitable for stable, high quality video calls.
Your ping is low. Your connection will likely not cause noticeable lag playing online games.
Your ping is high. Your connection may cause noticeable lag playing online games, however a high ping may be caused by .
